orderId.description: Unique identifier for the WooCommerce order associated with the completed payment.

amount.description: Total amount charged for the payment.

currency.description: Currency code for the payment (e.g., USD, EUR).

paymentMethod.description: The method used for the payment (e.g., credit card, PayPal).

transactionId.description: Unique identifier for the payment transaction.

name.description: Full name of the customer who made the payment.

sendEmailToCustomer.description: Indicates if a confirmation email should be sent to the customer.

notifyAdmin.description: Indicates if the admin should be notified about the completed payment.

customerEmail.description: Content of the email to be sent to the customer.

adminEmail.description: Content of the email to be sent to the admin.

supplierEmail.description: Content of the email to be sent to the supplier.

shopManagerEmail.description: Content of the email to be sent to the shop manager.
